name: compostjs
description: Composable data visualization library for JavaScript
author: Tomas Petricek

scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite
scripts.build: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj -o dist && rm dist/fable_modules/.gitignore
scripts.standalone: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite build && sh copy-latest.sh
scripts.updatejs: npm run standalone && git add . && git commit -m "Update standalone release file in docs"
scripts.release: np --yolo --no-release-draft --no-publish && npm run updatejs && npm run rebuild && npm publish
